column4: hi all. i m using ubuntu 10.10. problm with empathy chat. account manager crashes as soon as i select irc to create an irc account
might I suggest you use 'pidgin'

http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:ZZSAm8S6j1IJ:live.gnome.org/Empathy/FAQ+empathy+chat.+account+manager+crashes+as+soon+as+i+select+irc&cd=1&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=us <-- follow the link to the header 'IRC" , its not promising
xchat is a good choice for 'irc'
if you decide to esperiment, try pidgin, irc without the irc look,
yes, to a degree

one of my frnd has a problem with network manager.the internet was working all fine with both  wireless data card and gprs. but sudenly one day the network manager applet shows up with a red exclamation mark saying tat network manager is not running,networking disabled,,tryed maney things frm forms but still the problem exist,, and bluetooth is also not working
not enough info, no idea
tat system is lenovo g560 running on ubuntu 10.10
pls sugest specific info
I will assume though that since it was working fine till I saw no network that the issue is 'no network avail'
or, your friend decided to play with 'firewalls' but forgot to tell you?
tried clicking it into run mode?
: wat is run mode?
this machine that does not work, you looking at it?
: when we rightclick on network applet icon everything is grayed out..cannot select anything under tat menu
this machine that does not work, you looking at it?
: no that is a remote machine i hav no access to it
: i m just trying to help him fix it
I can't help you, its hard to imagine scenarios, sorry
